main event: An unidentified flying object was observed moving erratically in Seattle, Washington on September 17, 1963.
interesting points: The object was described as the same size as a star and moved in a zigzag pattern., The object remained in sight for about 45 seconds before disappearing, then reappeared and remained stationary for about 1.5 minutes., When it accelerated, it took a downward diagonal path., The observation was made using a ground radar system which did not detect the object., There were no sounds heard and no other aircraft were observed in the vicinity.
witness description: An adult who observed the object moving erratically.
